pronunciation: CORMORANT, [Cormorant is supposed to be corrupted from corvus marinus, sea raven. The Welsh also call the fowl morvran, sea crow.]

definitions.text:
1. water raven, large of pelican kind; head and neck are black; coverts of wings, scapulars and back are of deep green, edged with black and glossed with blue. base of lower mandible covered with naked yellow skin, which extends under chin and forms sort of pouch. This occupies cliffs by sea, feeds on fish, and extremely voracious.
2. glutton.
